title: Introducing the all new "MegaMouth" Catch Counter!
paragraphs: Has a larger throat for bigger fish, is stronger, and built to to take abuse! CatchCounter is a NEW product that will make your fishing trip easier and less stressfull.
Why use a hand talley clicker when you can just drop your catch into CatchCounter and go back to fishing?
No need for someone lifting the cooler lid every time a fish is caught. Strong, Accurate and Made in the USA!
